SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, t2.team_name AS team2_name, g.team1_score, g.team2_score , DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%y.%m.%d') AS game_date , t1.team_logo as team1_logo , t2.team_logo as team2_logo FROM Game g JOIN Gather gd1 ON g.game_team1 = gd1.gather_id JOIN Gather gd2 ON g.game_team2 = gd2.gather_id
JOIN Team t1 ON gd1.team_id = t1.team_id JOIN Team t2 ON gd2.team_id = t2.team_id WHERE g.game_status=2 ORDER BY gd1.gather_date desc LIMIT 2;

SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, IFNULL(t2.team_name, 'null') AS team2_name, DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%H:%i') AS game_date, t1.team_logo AS team1_logo, IFNULL(t2.team_logo, 'null') AS team2_logo FROM game g JOIN Gather gd1 ON g.game_team1 = gd1.gather_id LEFT JOIN Gather gd2 ON g.game_team2 = gd2.gather_id JOIN Team t1 ON gd1.team_id = t1.team_id LEFT JOIN Team t2 ON gd2.team_id = t2.team_id WHERE game_status = 0 OR game_status = 1 AND DATE(game_date) = CURDATE();

SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, IFNULL(t2.team_name, 'null') AS team2_name, DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%H:%i') AS game_date, t1.team_logo AS team1_logo, IFNULL(t2.team_logo, 'null') AS team2_logo FROM game g JOIN Gather gd1 ON g.game_team1 = gd1.gather_id LEFT JOIN Gather gd2 ON g.game_team2 = gd2.gather_id JOIN Team t1 ON gd1.team_id = t1.team_id LEFT JOIN Team t2 ON gd2.team_id = t2.team_id WHERE (game_status = 0 OR game_status = 1) AND DATE(game_date) = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);

SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, IFNULL(t2.team_name, 'null') AS team2_name, DATE_FORMAT(g.game_date, '%H:%i') AS game_date, t1.team_logo AS team1_logo, IFNULL(t2.team_logo, 'null') AS team2_logo FROM game g JOIN Gather gd1 ON g.game_team1 = gd1.gather_id LEFT JOIN Gather gd2 ON g.game_team2 = gd2.gather_id JOIN Team t1 ON gd1.team_id = t1.team_id LEFT JOIN Team t2 ON gd2.team_id = t2.team_id WHERE (game_status = 0 OR game_status = 1) AND DATE(game_date) = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 DAY);
